comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: There's a page for catcher Theodore Harrison Easterly (1885–1951) at Baseball-Reference.com. His career lasted from 1909 to 1915, and he played for the Chicago White Sox and the Cleveland Naps of the American League as well as the Kansas City Packers of the Federal League. Brief Wikipedia biography.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
whyaduck:

Thanks for the additional information. We'll add Easterly's full name to the source data and reload the description in Flickr to match.
